feature.label: iSphere Compare Filters for RDi 9.5+ (obsolete)
feature.description: iSphere Compare Filters for RDi 9.5+ This plug-in is obsolete, because the compare filters have been moved to the iSphere Core Plugin. Do not install the plug-in and uninstall old versions of the plug-in.
